woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

pinyin: Sa4 da2 mu3 · Hou2 sai4 yin1

sentences.english: That' s the production end of Saddam' s chemical weapons bu sine ss.
sentences.chinese: 這是薩達姆化學武器業的生產情況。

sentences.english: S. has only won the first stage of the war against Sadam regime.
sentences.chinese: 美國只是贏了這場反對薩達姆政權的戰爭的第一階段。

sentences.english: Saddam Maake bills himself as the number-one fan of the South African team.
sentences.chinese: 薩達姆Maake法案的頭號球迷，南非隊自己。

sentences.english: Why is Saddam's oil minister still in prison?
sentences.chinese: 前薩達姆政府石油部長至今身陷囹圄爲哪般？

sentences.english: My recon squad had engaged Saddam's army in a small Bedouin encampment.
sentences.chinese: 我的偵察班在貝多因的一個小營地與薩達姆軍隊交戰。

sentences.english: Sadam is too stubben. but he loves his country.
sentences.chinese: 儘管薩達姆太固執，但他很熱愛自己的國家。

sentences.english: Do you know how Sadam was caught ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道薩達姆是如何被捕的嗎？

sentences.english: Saddam to set an army of ex-prisoners against Washington's saboteurs.
sentences.chinese: 薩達姆大羣的獲釋囚徒對抗華盛頓派遣的蓄意破壞者。

sentences.english: The report of the meeting was sent directly to Saddam’s son, Odey.
sentences.chinese: 會議紀要被直接送至薩達姆的兒子奧迪手中。

sentences.english: I will not speak against Saddam until I am a free man.
sentences.chinese: 成爲自由人之前，我是不會說反對薩達姆的話的。

sentences.english: At age 18, Saddam graduated from primary school and applied to military school.
sentences.chinese: 18歲時，薩達姆從小學畢業，申請加入軍事院校。

sentences.english: Saddam, who bragged that the Babylonian lion on behalf of Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 薩達姆自詡爲巴比倫的雄獅在此代表伊拉克。

sentences.english: Who said of containment against Saddam Hussein We are able to keep arms from him. His military forces have not been rebuilt ?
sentences.chinese: 誰說對薩達姆的圍堵政策使得他不能夠重建軍事力量？

sentences.english: Sometimes, Saddam's notorious son Uday also weighed in.
sentences.chinese: 薩達姆惡名昭著的兒子烏代也時常參與其中。

sentences.english: Muhammad despised Saddam Hussein's despotic regime.
sentences.chinese: 默罕默德瞧不起薩達姆侯賽因的暴虐政權。

sentences.english: The U. S, leading war over IRAQ has caused regime change of SADAM .
sentences.chinese: 美國發動的伊拉克戰爭導致了薩達姆政權得更迭。
